page.title: 12BABY - 0-1 YEAR OLD
page.content: At ten days of age a blood sample was taken to see if he was mentally handicapped.When six weeks examined by the family doctor.Visits from the Health Visitor followed weekly and every fortnight he was taken to the clinic for a check-up.At four months his first injection for diphtheria,tetanus, and syrup for polio prevention. His mother decided not to have the controversial whooping cough injection. At six months his sight,hearing and physical development were checked.When born James slept for 14 hours.He was breast fed every four hours for six weeks. He then gave up his night feed.At about four months started to eat pulpy food and until six months all his food and drink were sterilised.He was laid on his side for sleep.
